lead_paragraph: Steven Stamkos scored a goal in his fourth consecutive game, Andrei Vasilevskiy made 29 saves and the Tampa Bay Lightning won their fourth straight by beating the Arizona Coyotes 2-1 on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Stamkos Scores Again, Streaking Lightning Beat Coyotes 2-1
headline.print_headline: Stamkos Scores Again, Streaking Lightning Beat Coyotes 2-1

snippet: Steven Stamkos scored a goal in his fourth consecutive game, Andrei Vasilevskiy made 29 saves and the Tampa Bay Lightning won their fourth straight by beating the Arizona Coyotes 2-1 on Tuesday night....
